song_lyrics: Bhaj Bhagwān mān taj bhāī, ā jag svārath jūṭh sagāī...
Peṭ ke kāj akāj kamāī, Shrī Ghanshyām diye bisrāī... bhaj 1
Daulat dekhī āvat akḍāī, ant same kachhu kām na āī... bhaj 2
Rog asādhya rahyo ur chhāī, gāfal jīvat gāṭh gamāī... bhaj 3
Devānand kahat sukhdāī, nar tan ko fal det batāī... bhaj 4
title: Bhaj Bhagwān mān taj bhāī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-510: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
